com.poesys.accounting.bs.account

Class AbstractAccountGroupDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDaoDelegate<S>
      • com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDataDelegate<BsAccountGroup,IAccountGroup,com.poesys.db.pk.NaturalPrimaryKey>
        • com.poesys.accounting.bs.account.AbstractAccountGroupDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.poesys.bs.delegate.IDataDelegate<BsAccountGroup,IAccountGroup,com.poesys.db.pk.NaturalPrimaryKey>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountGroupDelegate

    public abstract class AbstractAccountGroupDelegate
extends com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDataDelegate<BsAccountGroup,IAccountGroup,com.poesys.db.pk.NaturalPrimaryKey>

    A business delegate that provides an application programming interface for AccountGroup objects and their dependents. You should not modify this class; instead, override or add methods in the class AccountGroupDelegate, which specializes this class.

    A named group of accounts, grouping the accounts for presentation and aggregation in financial statements

    Author:
    Poesys/DB Cartridge
    See Also:
    AccountGroupDelegate

      • createAccountGroup

        public BsAccountGroup createAccountGroup(java.lang.String groupName)
                                  throws com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException

        Create a new AccountGroup with data fields.

        The AccountGroup class has a natural key; this method creates the primary key from the appropriate input properties.

        Parameters:
        groupName - the name of the group of accounts; examples: Cash, Fixed Assets, Accounts Payable, Tax-Related Expenses
        Returns:
        the new AccountGroup object
        Throws:
        com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException - when there is a problem generating the key or creating the object
